import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Button, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return ( <> {/* Shipping */}

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

{/* Payment Method */}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod} {/* Order */}

Order Items

{cart.orderItems === 0 ? Your cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} * ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
